---
title: "Radon Code Book"
date: '2024-12-05'
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Data from 919 homes. 

`log.u` = logarithm of county uranium levels

`uranium` = uranium levels at the county level

`radon` = radon levels

`log.radon` = log radon levels 

`floor` = whether the reading was taken in the basement (0) or the grond floor (1). 

`county` = the county
